body.name: ANXRE 50" Selfie Stick Phone Tripod with Remote, Portable 5 in 1 Selfie Stick Phone Tripod, Wireless Selfie Stick Tripod for Cell Phone Compatible with iPhone 15/14/13 Pro Max Gopro Android
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 50 mins
features: 【2024 NEWEST REINFORCED STABILITY＆HAND-FREE DETACHABLE REMOTE】ANXRE selfie stick tripod with remote is adopted the advanced designed compared to most selfie stick -wider legs with anti-slip rubber and 3 built-in stainless holders for ensuring each shots come out clear and shake-free. What makes amazing is the wireless remote of selfie stick tripod with remote using the latest V5.2 chip,which is easy to pair,work range up to 10m(30 feet) and support more than 20,000 selfies.

【SECURE 360° ROTATABLE PHONE HOLDER＆50" LONG SELFIE STICK 】You can tilt the phone of travel selfie stick to get various angles due to advanced design-360° rotating phone clip with protected rubber and 180° neck rotation. ANXRE 50" smartphone selfie stick allows for a wide range of shooting angles and say goodbye to annoying slide down.The telescopic pole of cell phone selfie stick extend from 9.8" to 50" easily(6 segment),which is longer and perfect for family shoots,group shoots.

【PORTABLE＆VERSATILE＆EASY TO USE SELFIE STICK TRIPOD 】The portable selfie stick can be used as a selfie stick or a phone tripod.The lightweight(7.5oz) and small size makes the travel tripod selfie stick portable enough to carry around.The selfie stick tripod is easy to set up and folds up nice,which is great for traveling,hiking,camping.The travel selfie stick tripod with remote comes with ergonomical handle with frosted texture,which is more safer and comfortable to take pictures or vedios.

【WIDELY COMPATIBLE WITH PHONE,GOPRO,DJI】The vlogging phone tripod securely holds phone from 4.7"-7" even though with bulky cases.Thanks to detachable phone holder of tripod selfie stick with remote.The selfie stick is compatible with Gopro and DJI.The Buletooth selfie stick tripod with remote is widely compatible with iphone 15/14 pro max/Pro/Plus/14+13 Pro Max/Pro/13+12 Pro Max/Pro/12+11 Pro Max/Pro/11+iPhone XS Max/XS/XR/X+iPhone 8 Plus/8+iPhone 7 Plus/7+Samsung Galaxy S22/ S21 and ect.

【SATISFACTION WARRANTY OF SELFIE STICK 】Providing optimal sevice and high quality selfie stick is what ANXRE committed to.ANXRE have confidence in the quality of phone tripod and offer 24 months worry-free warranty.Each tripod for cell phone will be checked carefully before shipping.If you have any problem about ANXRE selfie stick,please contact us and ANXRE service team will help you in 24H.Hope ANXRE selfie stick could capture every beautiful moment without asking stranger help for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: "I am truly impressed with the ANXRE Selfie Stick Tripod. It is a versatile and high-quality product that exceeds all my expectations. The 50-inch height is perfect for capturing the best shots.The wireless remote control is incredibly convenient. I can place my phone on the tripod mount and take photos or record videos without touching the device. This is especially useful for group selfies or capturing stunning landscapes.The compatibility with a wide range of devices is another great feature. I have tested this tripod with my iPhone 15 Pro Max, as well as other iPhone models and Android devices, and it has worked perfectly with all of them. I have also used my DJI camera with this tripod, and the results have been excellent.The tripod's construction is solid and durable. I feel confident placing my device on it, as it remains stable and doesn't wobble. Additionally, it is very easy to carry thanks to its portable and lightweight design.In summary, the ANXRE Selfie Stick Tripod is an excellent choice for those seeking a reliable and versatile product. Its remote control, compatibility with different devices, and quality construction make it a must-have tool for any photography or video enthusiast. I highly recommend it!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for price
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I was looking for. A cheap selfie/standing stick for taking pictures with my phone at home. Yes, it is a little wobbly at the tallest setting, but not so much that you can't take a good picture with it. The grip for the phone is also pretty strong so I'm not worried about the phone falling out. The remote works perfectly with my android phone and all I had to do was connect to it via Bluetooth. It's compact and small once collapsed. Overall very happy with it and would recommend for anyone looking for a cheap holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Stand works well with rubber tips. Pretty steady and easily extends with little effort to a good height. Lightweight.Phone is held securely by plastic clips with rubber grip inside. Can rotate clip. And can pull and extend clips for larger phone. Worked with a S20 phone and gets larger.I didn't try the photo button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and tall
reviews.reviewText: Great hight and Bluetooth works perfectly. Only downside to this is the design causes it to be top heave. This will serve for light use as a stand but I would look for something with a wider/more secure base. I intend to use it in the gym on the treadmill so my wife and I can both see the interval timer. Perfect for what I need tho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a very compact and easy to use tripod. I was surprised at how compact it was and how easy it was to expand. I have used other tripods that are bulky and not compact and not easy to transport and I do not have to worry about that anymore. Also, it comes with a bluetooth remote that is helpful if you are wanting to take a group photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Greta quality does not feel cheap I love its versatility can be used as small tripod for setting up on a desk and making videos as well as a selfie stick love the Bluetooth remote, just be aware at full extension of the tripod 60” it is not very sturdy and can be easily toppled over still 5/5 for me love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this tripod. Lightweight and compact. Sturdy enough for what I use it for. It’s perfect for my needs. I’ve had it for about 6 months and used it many times and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unsure about this
reviews.reviewText: Just got it today, the price was great but I'm not sure this is will work. 1st, it's really tricky to open the tripod. You have to pull really hard on the bottom to seperate the 3 "legs". Once you get them open a tad, the rod will pop out the top making it easier to fully extend.A lot of people said theirs didn't come with the remote. Unlikely. More likely they didn't notice it. See my photos. You need to extend the rod up before sliding the remote out.If you have an android, you may need to change your camera settings in your camera app to get the remote to work. At 1st all it was doing was increasing the phone volume. Once I changed the settings, it took the photo with the remote. See my photos. I'm worried about the stability of this. I bought it to record myself playing disc golf. It's good to be able to see your form. But that means I'll be outside in wind & the 3 legs on the tripod are so short & flimsy & the whole contraption is so light I'm afraid a 5 mph wind will knock it over. My screen is cracked so a fall from 50" up may ruin my phone. I'm not sure about this. I feel like I'm asking for trouble with this one. I may end up returning it. I'll update this review after I've had a chance to use it outside. I guess if you're using it as a selfie stick that won't matter. But I wanted it for its tripod abilities. I hope I didn't make a big mistake 😬😬😬
I like this tripod a lot. The height is very practical and it's very easy to use. I just wish it was a little sturdier, but for the price I believe it's ok.
Bought two for each of my kids! works great! easy to pair and use! not heavy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Simple to use and does the job as selfie stick or a tripod
reviews.reviewText: Needed a tripod ti hold m6 phone while recording videos. Did the job well and its better than other tripods as it is long and can stand on the ground.

Lo quería principalmente para uso esporádico en cumpleaños y vacaciones. Sirve perfectamente para su cometido, no abulta demasiado y se puede llevar cómodo en una mochila o bolso de mano.Es suficientemente estable para un uso no profesional, que es para lo que lo necesito.Si duda lo recomiendo por el precio de 12€ al que lo he comprado.

reviews.reviewTitle: La perche à selfie ultime pour les jeunes créateurs de contenus et pour voyager!
reviews.reviewText: La perche à selfie ANXRE avec trépied de 125 cm est sans aucun doute l'accessoire parfait pour immortaliser chaque moment de manière exceptionnelle. En tant que passionné de photos et de voyages, cette perche à selfie s'est rapidement imposée comme un incontournable dans mon équipement.La longueur de 125 cm offre une portée étendue, permettant de capturer des angles uniques et des perspectives incroyables. La construction robuste assure une stabilité, même lorsque la perche est pleinement étendue. Que ce soit pour des selfies en solo, des clichés de groupe, ou des vidéos , cette perche offre une flexibilité optimale.Le trépied amélioré ajoute une dimension supplémentaire à son utilité. Il offre une base solide pour des prises de vue stables, que ce soit sur une surface plane ou en extérieur sur un terrain accidenté. Les pieds antidérapants inspirent confiance, assurant une sécurité maximale pour votre appareil mobile.Le support universel ajustable s'adapte parfaitement à tous les smartphones, assurant une prise en main sécurisée. Le déclencheur Bluetooth inclus simplifie encore plus le processus de capture, offrant une commodité maximale.La légèreté et la compacité font de cette perche à selfie le compagnon de voyage idéal. Son design élégant et sa facilité d'utilisation en font un choix évident pour tous les amateurs de photographie et de moments mémorables.En résumé, la perche à selfie ANXRE avec trépied de 125 cm est un investissement précieux pour ceux qui cherchent à capturer des souvenirs d'une manière exceptionnelle. Je la recommande vivement pour sa qualité de construction, sa polyvalence et sa praticité. Un indispensable pour tout amateur de photos et de voyages !
